step.cmd: Code review each pull request and consider the following:

ul.li: Is this an expected change associated with a ticket or other planned work?
Are there privacy or security implications with this change?
Are there Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) concerns?
Are there performance impacts possible with this change?
Are slow IO functions properly cached?

step.cmd: Open an ADO item for each issue uncovered in the review process.
Project Manager prioritizes opened work items based on severity; any high priority issues must be resolved before releasing code to Staging or Production.
